committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to exempt certain lands in the State of Mississippi from a restriction set forth in the Act of April 21, 1806.

summary.text: Exempts specified lands in Adams County, Mississippi, from the requirement that they be preserved as a common public park.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain lands in the State of Mississippi from a restriction set forth in the Act of April 21, 1806.
